Question
========
  
One of the predictor variables in an article by Verkuyten and Masson was the variable age. After this variable was measured, the researchers categorized it into three groups: 12- and 13-year-olds, 14- and 15-year-olds, and 16- and 17-year-olds. What level of measurement does this new variable have?

  
Answerlist
----------
* Nominal
* Ordinal
* Interval
* Ratio
